Class SharedPreferencesHelper

    • Method Detail

      • getGroceryDays

        public Set<String> getGroceryDays()
        Returns a list of grocery days selected by the user in SettingsActivity.
        Returns:
        A Set containing the grocery days as lowercase strings. If none are selected, an empty Set is returned.
